title: Spell check error on multiple times error
body:
<!--
  Hi there! Thank you for discovering and submitting an issue.

  Before you submit this, make sure that the issue doesn't already exist
  or if it is not closed.

  Is your issue fixed on the preview release?: pip install pylint astroid --pre -U

-->

### Steps to reproduce
1. Write a docstring with some bad word two or more times in the same line
2. Run spell check `pylint --disable all --enable spelling --spelling-dict en_US test_spell.py`
3. See how the word is erroneously pointed 

### Current behavior
Bad pointed word after the first

### Expected behavior
Every word have to by pointer in thier respective position

### pylint --version output
pylint --version                                                            
pylint 2.3.1
astroid 2.2.5
Python 3.6.7 (default, Oct 22 2018, 11:32:17) 
[GCC 8.2.0]

```
❯ cat test_spell.py 
def test():
    """
    teh teh
    hotsname hotsname
    teh import thing to teh pylint
    """
    pass

❯ pylint --disable all --enable spelling --spelling-dict en_US test_spell.py
************* Module test_spell
test_spell.py:3:0: C0402: Wrong spelling of a word 'teh' in a docstring:
    teh teh
    ^^^
Did you mean: ''the' or 'eh' or 'tech' or 'tee''? (wrong-spelling-in-docstring)
test_spell.py:3:0: C0402: Wrong spelling of a word 'teh' in a docstring:
    teh teh
    ^^^
Did you mean: ''the' or 'eh' or 'tech' or 'tee''? (wrong-spelling-in-docstring)
test_spell.py:4:0: C0402: Wrong spelling of a word 'hotsname' in a docstring:
    hotsname hotsname
    ^^^^^^^^
Did you mean: ''hots name' or 'hots-name' or 'whatshisname''? (wrong-spelling-in-docstring)
test_spell.py:4:0: C0402: Wrong spelling of a word 'hotsname' in a docstring:
    hotsname hotsname
    ^^^^^^^^
Did you mean: ''hots name' or 'hots-name' or 'whatshisname''? (wrong-spelling-in-docstring)
test_spell.py:5:0: C0402: Wrong spelling of a word 'teh' in a docstring:
    teh import thing to teh pylint
    ^^^
Did you mean: ''the' or 'eh' or 'tech' or 'tee''? (wrong-spelling-in-docstring)
test_spell.py:5:0: C0402: Wrong spelling of a word 'teh' in a docstring:
    teh import thing to teh pylint
    ^^^
Did you mean: ''the' or 'eh' or 'tech' or 'tee''? (wrong-spelling-in-docstring)

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Your code has been rated at -20.00/10 (previous run: -20.00/10, +0.00)

See how when the second word is checked, the first is pointed again.
```
